documentation.markdown: The Azure Region where the Chaos Studio Target should exist.
Specifies the Target Resource Id within which this Chaos Studio Target should exist.

The name of the Chaos Studio Target. This has the format of [publisher]-[targetType] e.g. `Microsoft-StorageAccount`. For supported values please see this Target Type column in [this table](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/chaos-studio/chaos-studio-fault-providers).
